page.title: 13Yarm Family Life
page.content: Our house is quite a big house. Although it has 14 rooms it only has three bedrooms. My brother,my mum,my dad and me live in the house.We spend most of our time looking after our animals.My mum does not shop in Yarm much she goes to Redcar or the big town.With my mum I sew,go shopping,go to shows,walk the dogs and go to my nannas,also I go on bike rides.With my dad I go to the park,go fishing,go riding,play football and make things.With my brother I go fishing,play out,ride and go on bike rides.My hobbies are going to discos,riding,football and going on bike rides and sewing.Our house is going up for sale soon,we have lived in Yarm for nearly 8 yrs and I have gone to Yarm Primary school since I started infants. (Victoria -aged 11)
